titles: The Humble desires and proposals of the private agitators of Colonel Hewsons regiment to the generall agitators of the army to be presented to His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax, and communicated to both houses of Parliament ...
author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
